scripts.generate: cd ./src && peggy cel.peggy --format bare --extra-options '{"typescript":true}' --plugin peggy-ts -o parser.ts
scripts.postgenerate: biome format src/parser.ts --write && git apply src/parser.patch
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --project tsconfig.json --module commonjs --verbatimModuleSyntax false --moduleResolution node10 --outDir ./dist/cjs && echo >./dist/cjs/package.json '{"type":"commonjs"}'
